means: 劫掠后的残迹，破坏的结果，毁坏后的残迹
毁坏( ravage的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Carol Drinkwater is blessed with a fine bone structure that stands up better to the ravages of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡罗尔·德林克沃特生就一副好身板，经过岁月历练还那么硬朗。

sentence.Network_en: The play is a rueful, wry observation about the way we are all subject to the ravages of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 该剧凄然而讽刺地描述了我们大家是如何被岁月所摧残的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Flames of war ever here firing ravages of war ., 战火曾把这里烧成一片焦土.
he parted from me as an overzealous Communist . this is how I produce ravages …他躲着我，好像我是个狂热的共产主义者一样。这就是我制造大破坏的方式。

list.abs: Today there are few reminders of the former ravaged and exploited Manchuria ., 如今 , 还有从前的创伤和开发满洲时期的痕迹.
war reparation战争赔款war ravaged遭战争蹂躏的war scarred被战争弄得疮痍满目的
insect powder 杀虫粉insect ravage 受昆虫的毁坏insect repellant 驱虫剂,昆虫忌避剂
After the financial hurricane ravaged the indicators of economic strength , sunlight broke through ., 在金融风暴摧毁了经济活力指标后 , 阳光破云而出.

entry.def: The ravages of time, war, or the weather are the damaging effects that they have.

example.ex: Carol Drinkwater is blessed with a fine bone structure that stands up better to the ravages of time.
example.tran: 卡罗尔·德林克沃特生就一副好身板，经过岁月历练还那么硬朗。

example.ex: ...a hi-tech grass pitch that can survive the ravages of a cold, wet climate.
example.tran: 耐寒抗湿的高科技草坪

auth_sentence.content: Six centuries have been unable to repair the ravages of four years.
auth_sentence.res_content: Six centuries have been unable to repair the ravages of four years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Six centuries have been unable to repair the ravages of four years.

auth_sentence.content: How do owners of antique vehicles deal with the ravages of ethanol?
auth_sentence.res_content: How do owners of antique vehicles deal with the ravages of ethanol?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How do owners of antique vehicles deal with the ravages of ethanol?
